account.introduction: Welcome to 121. Please log in below.
account.wrong-credentials: Your email and/or password are not recognized. Please try again.
account.no-connection: Not able to access the server. Please check your internet connection and try again later.
account.unequal-passwords: The passwords you provided are not the same. Please try again.

main-menu.introduction: The following actions are available. Please select one.

download-data.downloading: Validation data is being downloaded. Wait a second.
download-data.download-result: Validation data downloaded for {{nrDownloaded}} People Affected.
download-data.download-aborted: No validation data could be downloaded at this time. Please try again later.

scan-qr.introduction: Scan QR-code to retrieve Person Affected's information.
scan-qr.error: The scanned QR-code did not contain a reference-ID or program-ID.
scan-qr.unknownReferenceIdCombination: QR-code not found. You can try scanning another QR-code.
scan-qr.conclusion: Thank you. You have scanned a valid reference-ID.

upload-data.uploading: Validation data is being uploaded for {{nrStored}} PA. Wait a second.
upload-data.no-upload-data-stored: There is no validation data to upload. Please validate someone first.
upload-data.upload-aborted: No validation data could be uploaded at this time. Please try again later.

validate-program.introduction: Below you see the Person Affected's information for the specific program. Check it with the Person Affected, adapt where necessary, and confirm.
validate-program.please-confirm: Below is an overview of the Person Affected's information. Please confirm.
validate-program.conclusion: The validation data has been saved. Please make sure to upload it (now or when internet is available).

validate-fsp.introduction: Below you see the Person Affected's information for the chosen Financial Service Provider. Check it with the Person Affected, adapt where necessary, and confirm.
validate-fsp.no-fsp: There are no questions to validate for the chosen Financial Service Provider
validate-fsp.conclusion: The financial service provider data has been saved. Please make sure to upload it (now or when internet is available).

connection.error-retry: Something went wrong, do you want to try again?

validation.date: The date format you inputted is not valid. A valid date format example is 31-12-1970 which follows day-month-year, DD-MM-YYYY
validation.email: The email needs to have a valid format. For example: 'full.name@example.com'. Please adjust and try again.
validation.generic-error: We cannot process some of your input. Please check and update your answers.
validation.number: The answer needs to be a number. Please adjust and try again.
validation.phone-number: We couldn't verify this phone-number. Please adjust and try again.
validation.required: An answer is required for this question. Please adjust and try again.

qr-scanner.title: Scan QR-code
qr-scanner.error-not-compatible: Your device is not able to scan
qr-scanner.error-no-permissions: Please allow the camera to be used or check if its not already in use and try again.
